page.title: 05FARMWAYS-CONTINUED.
page.content:
TECHNOLOGY. The storage bins have a capacity of wenty five thousand tons each.There are sensitive probes in each bin to detect temperature changes which may indicate fermentation of the seeds, or the presence of insects in the storage bins. There is a computerised system to control movements between bins by way of conveyor belts and lifts.
{ACCESSIBILITY. The site is six miles from the A1; all transportation of the grain is by lorry. Some grain is{exported}to E.E.C. countries and Eastern block countries.
